headline: Madian politician Oscar Garcia Panyella, PhD caught in scandalous linkedin party.
text: Former Madian deputy vice-president of technology and culture Oscar Garcia Panyella, PhD was placed in custody by Albian police after the raid of an illegal linkedin party. Sources close to the case claim individuals in the party were engaging in networking and profile sharing. While Madian authorities have called for his release, he will appear before court in January 6th.

biases.name: Innocent
biases.description: Dr. Panyella's presence was likely an unfortunate coincidence.

While Madian authorities have called for his release, he will appear before court in January 6th.
